annex b: network element symbols b.1           type and class of network element symbols figure b.1 shows examples of the symbols proposed to identify different network element classes, extrapolated from ansi t1.232 [1]. figure b.1: examples of the ansi recommended network element symbols 30                             eg 201 024 v1.1.1 (1997-05) figure b.2 shows examples of how the proposed symbols may be enhanced to identify different equipment functionality, extrapolated from ansi t1.232 [1]. figure b.2: examples of the ansi recommended symbols enhanced to show different functionalities 31                   eg 201 024 v1.1.1 (1997-05)
